entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Waskaganish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -18.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waskaganish Airport 4:00 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -18.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -21.3°C
Wind: NNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
